website_summaries.verdict: Features durable steel construction that's sturdy yet lightweight, with an ornate scroll design.
pros: Its solid steel design is highly durable
Black finish makes it look sleek and simple
Rubber feet included to prevent scratching wooden floors
cons: Some users find it too basic for their tastes

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the stand
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these. One a while back and one very recently (last week). When I received the new one, I realized there was only 1 protective rubber cover included. I went to the current stand I have, which has been inside in the same location the entire time, and there were NO protective rubber feet. I see from other reviews this seems to be a recurring problem. My floor is a hardy tile so really not a problem; it just makes you wonder about overall quality if they refuse to mitigate a recurring issue. Otherwise, I'm happy with the stand!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clendening-Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice plant stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice plant stand. It has (3) legs. Only came with (1) black cap. Missing (2) black caps. If someone reads this comment that can help me get (2) more black caps I would be very happy. I will not return this for the missing caps. The box was very large and to keep cost down on both sides I will just keep it. But I would love to have the missing caps mailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tall, strong, and sturdy plant stand
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a small, tall space I wanted to fill. It does the job without being overwhelming in its design. Despite its simplicity, it's strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily, poor feet design
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with these plant stands. I really wanted to like them, as they are very cute and fit my pots perfectly. However, there are two serious problems with them - 1) if they get wet, they immediately start to rust at all of the points where two pieces of metal meet (the soldering points) and 2) the feet have rubber caps on them that catch water and encourage rusting. As you can imagine, this is quite a problem for and outdoor plant stand. We had a big rainstorm this weekend and, when I checked on the plant stands afterwards, I noticed rust all over them.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToLearn

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Fits Industrial Style
customer_reviews.text: First off, I get a chuckle when people spend 20 bucks for a plant stand, then complain about the quality. I can recommend a site where very similar stands go for $50-$150 if you like. These are serving my purpose well. I have six now in different sizes arranged around the living room. When you get the plants on them and furniture around them, you can't distinguish these from the $100 ones. Yes, a couple were missing rubber feet. but it doesn't seem to matter. Today, I'm back ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wenning

customer_reviews.title: Great height!
customer_reviews.text: So if my house wasn’t built in 1905 and slightly crooked I might have given this less stars as it is slightly uneven. Luckily for me it works in my house. I love the height as it allows my plant to really get into the window. Does it get the job done, yes. Does it look okay, yes. I really can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybeenz

customer_reviews.title: If you value your plants, don’t buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of $25 purchased in 2018. It’s worth about $10 tops. Unstable! And the legs are flexible so if you do not set it down carefully, the planter and plant can topple over. I bought multiple metal stands similar to this in retail stores that are extremely sturdy and well-made for much less! This is a typical overseas-rip-off. The benefit of buying in-person if you get to actually feel and see the item. Online they can say whatever they want about their product; and reviewer’s can be phony or exaggerated. This is an inferior product, way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Murray Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Small missing part, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: The plant stand is what I expected. The only negative is that there are little rubber "feet" to go on the bottom of each leg, so it doesn't scratch your floors. Mine came with only two of the rubber feet instead of three. I tore the box apart looking for the missing piece, but no luck. It doesn't show, so it's not really a big deal - just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: keylimejet

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice design but I am about to have to return it a second time. For the first one the pain on the part that holds the pot was pitted, in a few places so I could see the metal underneath (see photo). I packed it up, took it back and the replacement arrived a day later - very fast. However, on of the legs was missing the rubber protectors that keep it from sliding and scratching the floor. I would prefer to spend more money and get one that is not defective than to waste paper, fuel, time and energy to have tsend it back, especially more than once.
customer_reviews.author: D L in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Really nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I have placed this stand in my living room with a large peace lily on it and it looks great. Very sturdy, my only complaint is that the bottom of the "shelf" part which is square bars are spaced a little to wide for the pot I am using with the plant to be very stable, if I had a larger pot it wouldn't be an issue though. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Warped, crooked legs
customer_reviews.text: There is an inherent risk in ordering online, we all know. I had high hopes for this stand, as it perfectly fit the aesthetic I was going for. Unfortunately, the craftsmanship left soooooo much to be desired. One leg is warped, another is warped AND crooked, and the third can only be described as straight-ish. It hasn't toppled yet and seems to be holding up alright, but I wouldn't dare put a heavier load on it than I have right now. Why didn't I return? Convenience is all. I've been housebound after surgery and can't get out to mail. I will make do with clever positioning so as not to draw too much attention to the defects.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant design at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this plant stand. However, we don't use it for that. We put a big candle on it next to our hot tub. It was very inexpensive compared to Overstock and Wayfair... and included free shipping (Amazon prime member). We like the simple design and the rubber tips on the legs will help keep it from rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Northeast Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Missing some of the rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: One of the two of these that I ordered was missing the rubber feet so I had to return it, it’s lightweight not super sturdy but works for a plant that’s not very heavy. I also ordered three of these in a taller size and two of them were missing the rubber feet. I will not be ordering more because of the high percentage that they will be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: nice stand! great price!
customer_reviews.text: This stand surprised me! I had been to our local plant nursery looking for pots and decided to price stands. I was shocked at the prices! The cheapest was around 35 and was thin, white plastic coating...ugly and not sturdy. This stand is as described. It measures correctly for height and width. The metal is square cut and very thick and sturdy. It could easily hold a heavy plant in a 10 inch pot. It is basic and simple looking (but attractive!), which is what we wanted....it's about the plant not the stand. We will be getting more of these. For this quality, the price is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Nutmeggin

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Legs too thin and its too tall. Not sturdy. I wouldnt put it outside on a screened porch if you get breezes. There are big spaces where the plant sits, so you have to put a plate there and put the plant on the plate. Or just try to put it where the pot edge will not be over a space.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Plant stands
customer_reviews.text: Really love this stand. Only thing is the rubber boots did not come along with it. I have 4 stands , 3 legs on each stand that’s 12 legs in all and 3 rubber boots for all those legs. LOL I give up 🧐
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, small footprint stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, small footprint stand. Through no fault of the stand, it is a little wobbly for me but that's because of the planter I have on it is a bit small for it. I think even if you have a perfect-sized planter, you still want to be careful with knocking it over just because it's so tall (especially with kids or pets). I have two of these in the house and they fit nicely with our decor and you're easily able to see the plant and easy access to water the plants, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand. Light weight but holds a pretty heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand. Light weight but holds a pretty heavy pot. First one only had one rubber cap for the legs. Amazon was very quick about replacing it. Second stand arrived with 2 of 3 rubber caps. Someone at the factory doesn't get the concept of 3 legged stand needs 3 plastic leg caps. Easily correct with electrical tape (triple thickness) on end of legs. It's now balanced and looks like the other cap.
customer_reviews.author: Royh

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. It was not well made and was flimsy. I kept waiting for the wind to blow it over, Also two of the rubber levelers were missing. I am use to better quality products. I would not recommend this product. Sorry, Rosa
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: I have these stands in my Garden. I needed to get my plumeria and cactus off the garden floor, and these are the right height so they are not top heavy. I purchased several of these and I couldn’t be happier. Once i get more organized, I will purchase a few more
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is exactly what I wanted. The right height so that the plant can now be seen next to the chair and the plant can also now get some filtered light. The stand itself is simple in design, which I like. It feels sturdy; the plant and pot sit easily on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. JarvisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: As pretty as this is, I modified it to use it for my 5 gallon water filtration system. I sawed an inch and a half off on the scroll-work fencing part to accommodate the spout of my 5 gallon water reservoir where the spout sticks out. It works beautifully. With the elevation, I can place gallon jugs and all my containers on the table under the spout rather than having the spout hang over the table and having to hold the containers and jugs while I fill them.. It's a real pretty and sturdy stand for plants or other uses you may come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Lyvwell

customer_reviews.title: Rather unstable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not super satisfied with these.. They are not terribly stable (I have them against the wall so there's more support) but they look decent and are functional. Probably won't buy these again if I had the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Hema Padhu

customer_reviews.title: Unconventional use
customer_reviews.text: The bed in our guest room is set, headboard in, in an alcove with a scant 10" space on either side of the headboard. We could not find any type of night stand we could use in this space. In one of those flashes of "Ah ha" moments I focused my thinking on something tallish rather than wide. There in the den, with a pretty little planter sitting in its top was this plant stand. The stand fit perfectly in the 10" space! Put a round plate in the top and we now have a night stand. Had to order another one of these awesome and "use anywhere and anyway" plant stands for the now forlorn plant in our den.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made product
customer_reviews.text: Note that the inside of the stand, where your plant pot needs to fit, has an interior width of 9.5 inches. The stand comes with plastic floor protectors on its feet.
customer_reviews.author: Roger P.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 3 of these plant holders. There are ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these plant holders. There are some spots on all three where the black coloring is missing. We had some black spray paint so I covered the missing spots. Also, two of them were missing one or more foot pads which prevent scratches to the floor. All that said, they're what I was looking for and did suit my needs. We were able to add the missing foot pads from materials we had on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Li'l Ceee

customer_reviews.title: two of the rubber foot guards were missing.
customer_reviews.text: One foot guard was wrapped in plastic with a rubber band around it, the other two were missing, which makes the stand a bit wobbly . I would love to have 2 more foot guards shipped to me. Other than those missing pieces the stand is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: G. Clark

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product in the 10+ years that I've been ordering from Amazon that was so poor in quality that I returned it. The black coating was chipped in multiple locations, and for the price I expected something sturdier. I also ordered the shorter one and one of the protective tips on the legs was missing. I will be returning both for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Simple and serviceable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, simple, plant stand at a very reasonable price. It's perfect for perching plants near a window for more sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maclay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheesy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is cheesy. There are three legs, only two came with rubber caps on the ends to protect the floor from the sharp edges of the rough cut metal legs. When I carried it to the living room, one end cap fell off, so I had to put electrical tape on two of the three legs so that it would balance correctly. Put a 9 inch pot spider plant in it, and it's kind of shaky. Definitely not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: An indoor plant stand
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly what we’re looking for, simple and stylish. We found the coating is on the weak side, particularly at the top corner areas. We could feel the peeling of the coating w/ the finger tip.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Large slats
customer_reviews.text: These are tall, sturdy, and are try to the picture. My only complains is that there are only a few bars/slats going across the top meaning that my pots with smaller bases are hard to stand on it. If it weren’t for that I’d give it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Matney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only came with two out of three floor protectors so I ended up opting to move the other two so it’s balance flat. Very disappointed as I read from other reviews they ran into the same issue. Floors are now subject to be scratched....
customer_reviews.author: CFischer

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with rubber piece on leg bottoms. Paint chipped off.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great except the first time I received it, only one of the legs have a rubber bottom part attached to it (so as to keep from scratching the floor), but why not the other two legs? So thinking it was an error, I returned it and ordered a new one specifically asking for rubber pieces on legs. The new one came, again with only one rubber piece on the leg and with some of the paint chipped off. Would be a perfectly fine product with a little more attention to detail from the sellers side.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: You can do better.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute piece but it was missing a rubber cap on one of the legs ( which it needs for balance and to stay stable ). I had to rig the bottom to make it work. For the inconvenience I would’ve rather gone out and bought what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JamieB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Order received in a timely manner. Stands are very pretty with the plants in them. Rated Stability lower because one of the three rubber end cover for the stands metal leg was missing. I would buy again and ask that they add an extra rubber cover to replace the missing one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: These plant stands (I ordered two) arrived with paint damage in multiple spots. The black was totally gone down to bare metal. Of the three legs on each stand, a total of six, only one leg had the protective rubber tip on it. Very poor condition in my opinion. Do not order these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy window height plant stand
customer_reviews.text: You would think this would be a simple thing to buy at retail. It isn't. There is a lot of junk out there. I thought I'd take a chance with Amazon even though I couldn't see it based on the other positive reviews. When I opened up the box it exceeded expectations! Its just below window height and can handle a decent sized pot (approx 10"). The only minus is that you have to be careful unwrapping It. In shipment the plastic floor protectors came off and I didn't notice that at first until I tried to level it. They're small and black plastic so easy to overlook.
customer_reviews.author: theRangel

customer_reviews.title: 5 of the six rubber feet are missing
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but the missing feet indicate to me that the care in sending what was ordered is negligent.
customer_reviews.author: J McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Works but caution
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, but easily topples over. Does it’s job though and keeps my plants off the ground and out of reach of the fur kids for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsier and less stable than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: First, the product came without one of the rubber feet so now it wobbles. Second, it's flimsier and less stable than I thought it would be. Third, it is easier to accidentally tip over because of this, so it's best used in a more out-of-the-way area of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The height was right and the leg tips were all there but it is flimsier than I expected from the reviews. It does not have a solid feel through those long legs and I cannot imagine that a strong wind wouldn't tip it right over, even with a heavy plant. It is attractive and fits the space I had in mind perfectly but I am not sure if it will hold up - or stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: None of the rubber floor protectors were on the legs, it will scratch my floor badly! Why can't you just send me the rubber parts, why do I have to return it?
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Hedlund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plant stand for your patio or deck or porch!
customer_reviews.text: I love these plant stands. We have two and they have been perfect for our front porch and back porch. They look very nice and hold up very well with the varying weather. The flower pots look really nice in the stands. The only complain I have is the rubber pieces on the bottom of each leg have a tendency to come off/get stuck on the ground when you move the stand. When I bought them the price was very reasonable for what you got, but it appears now the price has gone up some since I first bought them.
customer_reviews.author: MeggieD

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Stand, Missing Foot Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am apparently just one of the many customers who received a stand that was missing a rubber foot cover, so I'm giving this product 4 stars. It was shipped in an inadequate box, and the foot must have fallen out through one of the openings in the box. I have no idea how to get a replacement rubber foot covering. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Mary Becker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without  the rubber tips!!
customer_reviews.text: I plan to return the item even though I generally like the look. Without the rubber tips, it doesn't work for my floor. I'll complete this review if/when the missing tips are received.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, sturdy stand that I hope will last for years. After about 6 months it is doing well. Nice product, although pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl L. Biser

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. I love the finish and the height. It'll be perfect for a plant in the corner of my mother's bedroom. I would've given it 5 stars, but the rubber footings on 2 of the legs were missing which means I need to wait for the seller to send them before I can use the stand. This issue appears to be common among the customers so I would've assumed the seller would consider checking on this before item is shipped.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but....
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for, but one of the plastic protective feet was missing. I substituted one of my quad cane feet for now. The packaging was good and not damaged so the foot didn't fall off in transit. It was missing before shipping. I will update review if I am able to obtain a replacement foot cover from manufacturers
customer_reviews.author: Adlih

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: New, by reading reviews, id be missing a rubber boot or two, but i had the number to call to get replacements, and there was no hassle
customer_reviews.author: dewyer p

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: The stand was what I was looking for, however it was a little wobberly. Can't be helped it was very tall and what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: James A Murad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These can be a little unstable. I had to push them down into the ground a few inches to keep them from falling over in a big wind. I was satisfied with the over all quality of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand! I actually ordered it to use as a base for a bird bath & even though its lightweight, it's very sturdy! Today's been cold and windy & it hasn't budged. I may buy more for some plants, haha . Great value, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a simple design, durable plant stand for our front porch and this fit the bill perfectly! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: ceramx

customer_reviews.title: Missing a rubber tip
customer_reviews.text: Great plant stand, well made, looks great, sturdy. However, as others have stated, one of the 2 I ordered was missing a rubber tip for the end of the leg. You need all 3 for it to be balanced and I also have hard wood floors that need protection from scratches. I wish I knew how to order the extra tips because an exchange of the entire product seems futile.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Inexepensive Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to elevate a potted plant! I am using on berber carpet & the stand is fairly stable. It's not located in a high traffic area but am thinking it wouldn't take much of a bump to topple stand on carpet. Overall great plant stand for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFun

customer_reviews.title: Plant stand
customer_reviews.text: The stand is just like it appears in the picture. The legs are metal and only one of them had a rubber cap on the bottom to protect floors. The other two were missing. I would've given it a better rating if all the pieces were received.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ojo

customer_reviews.title: Great inside plant-stand
customer_reviews.text: For those with multiple indoor plants (or even outdoor), this a great fit for a good price. Stand is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for a tight space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact plant stand. Fits well into a tight corner, and holds a heavy, mature aloe plant.
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta  A. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome, no assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: Love this plant stand! Looks classy, perfect size, and came 100 percent assembled. All i had to do was take it out of the box and put my plant on it. I’m definitely getting another one for my other corner!
customer_reviews.author: OperaGaga

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive plant stand that looks great indoors or out. It is very sturdy and has a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jayebee

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy finishing
customer_reviews.text: I probably would give this product four or five stars except that it had the rubber tip on only one of the three legs. I mean, come on, that's ridiculous. If they could put one on, why not all three
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand!
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. It doesnt wobble and I would feel comfortable putting 40 pounds on this stand. No flaws and looks cool, as far as plant stands go. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: oldschool

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Wobble
customer_reviews.text: The height of this stand met my requirements, but everything else failed. It's really cheap/lightweight metal and I assume it will probably rust quickly. Unfortunately, it arrived with just 1 rubber bottom which has caused it to be very wobbly and the ends of the legs are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Simple but strong construction. Perfect for small spaces but still holds a good sized pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product. The metal it's made from seems to be good quality, however one of the three legs was BROKEN when it arrived. Very disappointed. As you can see in the image, each of the three legs are made from two individual "legs" that converge together at the bottom to form one solid leg. Well, one of the three was not made correctly and did not converge together at the bottom. This has significantly effected the sturdiness. I will have to find some wire to wrap around the bottom of the two legs to keep it together and hopefully that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R. Kouba

customer_reviews.title: Nice plant stand!
customer_reviews.text: The plant stand is very attractive and sturdy. It was missing a rubber tip for the end of one leg and I contacted the manufacturer. They were great and are sending the tip to me by mail.
customer_reviews.author: Panchi

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is used as a plant holder and my wife is pleased. Good price and fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: dvdave123

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to love it when I receive the replacement
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to love it when I receive the replacement. Exactly what I wanted - however my first package arrived - its perfect EXCEPT one of the legs is missing a little black plastic "shoe" for the end. The other legs have black shoes to protect the floor. The other leg, is Cinderella, missing the shoe and will scratch my floor and make the plant holder unstable and not level. Once I get my replacement, I'll update....
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice stand for the price but I'm giving 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: The stand came a little bent out of shape and is missing one of the rubber caps on the leg. No matter, bent it back into shape, wife put a bow on it and a nice plant and she's pleased so I am too.
customer_reviews.author: TROY P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed - sturdy, pretty and I didn't have to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber tip for one of the legs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this plant stand but it was missing one if the little black rubber tips for the kegs to prevent floor scratching. I don’t want to return it for that small item but would appreciate receiving one!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: vcahn

customer_reviews.title: Missing foot
customer_reviews.text: I got this stand for the height and price. I'm very satisfied with the exception of the one foot missing. Not a big deal, but would have been nice to have all 3 as I have all hard floors. It seems to be a sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than it looks- look at the full measurements.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little sturdier if you put a heavy plant on it, but pretty good! Notice that the surface you set the plant on is barred, not solid! Looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Yehudit

customer_reviews.title: Missing feet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item and the slightly taller one. One arrived with on rubber foot. The other with only two. I was underwhelmed by the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Just the right height for a heavy plant
customer_reviews.text: Simple style and big enough for my overgrown plant. As other reviewers noted the cross bars were disconnected so it loses a star. Luckily my pot was wide enough that this wasn’t an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs-plants-yoga

customer_reviews.title: Good plant holder
customer_reviews.text: Great height plant holder for my entry. It works although it’s a bit more lightweight than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived assembled& in good shape. All 3 legs had rubber tip attached.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bayzle

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber caps
customer_reviews.text: Bought two plant stands. Rubber caps (which prevent scratches on wood floor and stabilize the stands) are missing on two of the legs. Would the seller/manufacturer please mail me two rubber caps? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ydanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Plant Stand!
customer_reviews.text: These are great plant holders. They can support a ridiculous amount of weight (had a big plant on one) and they have yet to get rusty. I've used them outside and inside and they hold up fantastically. I've had them for 3 years and they still look and feel the same way!! I would definitely recommend this product to everyone looking for a good plant stand.
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to report that the welding on the scroll-work of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to report that the welding on the scroll-work of this plant stand is done just fine. However, as others experienced, the protective rubber cap on one of the legs is missing (others were in a plastic bag and rubber banded to the leg). This may be a problem if used on a wood floor. In a pinch, I covered the exposed leg with some black tape to protect the flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: Like other have said, it arrived missing one of the three rubber tips for the feet. But otherwise it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: 30somethingCT

customer_reviews.title: Nice wire plant stand
customer_reviews.text: I must confess that I don’t use this stand as intended. I use it to keep my dogs’ toy bin off the floor and out of his reach:)
customer_reviews.author: ee

customer_reviews.title: missing
customer_reviews.text: This stand came with 3 legs but only 1 rubber tip.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Planters nice but came with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I received the planters and love them but they both came with missing rubber stomper on 4 of the legs. Not worth returning but now I am on the hunt to find the missing parts at the store. Stinks that there is no quality check on their items
customer_reviews.author: Happy lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This stand is just right for a single plant in the window
customer_reviews.author: G. Noe

customer_reviews.title: Nice wrought iron plant stand, lightweight but good construction
customer_reviews.text: I like this small plant stand. It is fairly lightweight but construction is otherwise good. I placed a large, bushy fern on it, put it in our front courtyard, and the wind blew it over a couple times. It is now on our back deck near the building and is doing fine. I'm guessing that with a less leafy plant it would not blow over, but I like the fern on it. Maybe I need to put the fern in a heavier pot... I am still happy with this attractive little stand.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Arrived chipped and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The legs are very thin metal. I didn't feel like returning it, so I just put a different plant than intended on it. If you bumped into it, it would topple.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Height is great.
customer_reviews.text: The rabbits hate this plant stand. They can't reach the flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Farm75

customer_reviews.title: Use it for smaller plants.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for large plants. It will tip over very easily.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA FARINELLI

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These will work for what I need but the quality is pretty poor. One I ordered was missing 2of the feet and another only had 2 legs (how that got shipped I'll never understand!) The replacement was about as good as the first. The place where the plant sits has very wide openings so if you don't position the pot perfectly it will fall over.
customer_reviews.author: True Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Missing a rubber leg protector
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the rubber leg protectors, so it’s not level. It was clearly packaged missing it, as the protectors are in small bags attached to each leg with a rubber band. When I pulled it out of the box the protectors were on 2 of the 3 legs. I double checked the box and packaging, but the 3rd was not in there. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time I put a flower pot on it
customer_reviews.text: One of the three bars that the flower pot sits on broke as soon as I placed the flower pot on it. If one more breaks it will be unusable. Otherwise it is pretty and would be perfect except for this one issue.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for small pots or decor items, but it could probably be ruined quick if you have kids and what not. Returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. My only complaint is that the rubber protector for the bottom wire feet was NOT included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE GILFILLAN

customer_reviews.title: YOUR PLANTS WILL LOVE YOU
customer_reviews.text: I HAD TWO LONELY WHITE FLOWER POTS IN MY BACKYARD..THEY WERE LOOKING FOR SOMETHING TO GIVE THEM HEIGHT, AND THEN I CAME ACROSS THESE LOVELY PLANT STANDS..LO AND BEHOLD, I ORDERED THEM..WOW, WHAT A DIFFERENCE THEY MAKE.... MY PLAIN WHITE POTS STAND OUT NOW..THESE STANDS ARE WELL MADE, WORTH THE PRICE AND DELIVERED VERY FAST..CANNOT WAIT FOR NEXT SUMMER TO USE THEM....YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED BUYING THESE BEAUTIES..I'M A HARD SELL AND THESE ARE JUST GREAT..THANK YOU COBRACO.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Evans

customer_reviews.title: Crooked Legs
customer_reviews.text: Mine isn't standing perfectly straight and symmetrical. I'm gonna try to position it and make it work because I don't feel like lugging it to the return center.
customer_reviews.author: Yay Jin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Holds up my Christmas cactus nicely. Seems well made. Level and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: working fine and looking nice
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks nice and is working fine. I was a bit worried that it might be tippy since it is so tall. But that hasn't been a problem so far. It looks good in our kitchen. I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to do which is hold a plant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CobraCo Canterbury 21-Inch Black Scroll Top Plant Stand SCBPS1021-B
product_meta.description: Size:21-InchThe CobraCo 21 Inch Canterbury Scroll Top Plant Stand, features three legs and a lovely scroll work design at the top. The textured black finish enhances the exquisite design of this unique plant stand and will suit your favorite flower or plant. Dimensions are 10"W x 21"H. Portable, decorative plant stands perfect for any outdoor area. CobraCo™ plant stands come in all shapes and sizes so there’s something for everyone! Take advantage of the various designs and colors these versatile stands have to offer.
feature_bullets: Features a round top and 3 legs
The plant stand measures 10-Inch wide and 21-Inch high
